event.description: Gary Brown pops out to shortstop Alex Gonzalez.
Emmanuel Burriss strikes out swinging.
Brandon Belt flies out to left fielder Ryan Braun.
Nate Schierholtz flies out to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Tommy Joseph grounds out, pitcher Randy Wolf to first baseman Mat Gamel.
Conor Gillaspie flies out to left fielder Ryan Braun.
Pitcher Change: Zack Greinke replaces Randy Wolf.
Eli Whiteside strikes out swinging.
Brandon Crawford singles on a ground ball to second baseman Brooks Conrad.
With Justin Christian batting, Brandon Crawford caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Jonathan Lucroy to second baseman Brooks Conrad.
Justin Christian strikes out swinging.
Gary Brown flies out to left fielder Ryan Braun.
Emmanuel Burriss singles on a line drive to right fielder Nyjer Morgan.
Brandon Belt singles on a fly ball to center fielder Carlos Gomez. Emmanuel Burriss to 3rd.
Nate Schierholtz grounds into double play, pitcher Zack Greinke to shortstop Alex Gonzalez to first baseman Mat Gamel. Brandon Belt out at 2nd.
Defensive Substitution: Norichika Aoki replaces left fielder Ryan Braun, batting 3rd, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Taylor Green replaces third baseman Aramis Ramirez, batting 4th, playing third base.
Pitcher Change: John Axford replaces Zack Greinke.
Tommy Joseph grounds out, second baseman Brooks Conrad to first baseman Mat Gamel.
Conor Gillaspie singles on a ground ball to right fielder Nyjer Morgan.
Eli Whiteside singles on a ground ball to left fielder Norichika Aoki. Conor Gillaspie to 2nd.
Brandon Crawford singles on a ground ball to center fielder Carlos Gomez. Conor Gillaspie scores. Eli Whiteside to 2nd.
Justin Christian flies out to right fielder Nyjer Morgan. Eli Whiteside to 3rd.
Gary Brown strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Logan Schafer replaces shortstop Alex Gonzalez, batting 7th, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Caleb Gindl replaces first baseman Mat Gamel, batting 6th, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Eric Farris replaces right fielder Nyjer Morgan, batting 2nd, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Travis Ishikawa replaces second baseman Brooks Conrad, batting 5th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Cesar Izturis replaces center fielder Carlos Gomez, batting 1st, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Martin Maldonado replaces catcher Jonathan Lucroy, batting 8th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Kameron Loe replaces John Axford.
Emmanuel Burriss strikes out swinging.
Brandon Belt flies out to center fielder Logan Schafer.
Nate Schierholtz grounds out to first baseman Travis Ishikawa.
Pitcher Change: Marco Estrada replaces Kameron Loe.
Tommy Joseph walks.
Conor Gillaspie pops out to catcher Martin Maldonado in foul territory.
Eli Whiteside grounds out, second baseman Eric Farris to first baseman Travis Ishikawa. Tommy Joseph to 2nd.
Brandon Crawford flies out to right fielder Caleb Gindl.
Pitcher Change: Juan Perez replaces Marco Estrada.
Justin Christian pops out to catcher Martin Maldonado in foul territory.
Gary Brown grounds out, third baseman Taylor Green to first baseman Travis Ishikawa.
Joe Panik singles on a line drive to center fielder Logan Schafer.
Brandon Belt grounds out to first baseman Travis Ishikawa.
Brock Kjeldgaard remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Michael Fiers replaces Juan Perez.
Roger Kieschnick grounds out, second baseman Eric Farris to first baseman Travis Ishikawa.
Tommy Joseph grounds out, pitcher Michael Fiers to first baseman Travis Ishikawa.
Conor Gillaspie pops out to shortstop Cesar Izturis.
Carlos Gomez grounds out, third baseman Conor Gillaspie to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Nyjer Morgan strikes out swinging.
Ryan Braun strikes out swinging.
Aramis Ramirez grounds out, shortstop Brandon Crawford to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Brooks Conrad grounds out, shortstop Brandon Crawford to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Mat Gamel pops out to shortstop Brandon Crawford.
Alex Gonzalez strikes out swinging.
Jonathan Lucroy doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Gary Brown.
George Kottaras strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Shane Loux replaces Madison Bumgarner.
With Carlos Gomez batting, wild pitch by Shane Loux, Jonathan Lucroy to 3rd.
Carlos Gomez singles on a soft fly ball to center fielder Gary Brown. Jonathan Lucroy scores.
Nyjer Morgan strikes out swinging.
Ryan Braun called out on strikes.
Aramis Ramirez lines out to third baseman Conor Gillaspie.
Brooks Conrad grounds out, first baseman Brandon Belt to pitcher Shane Loux.
Mat Gamel reaches on fielding error by first baseman Brandon Belt.
Alex Gonzalez grounds into double play, shortstop Brandon Crawford to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Brandon Belt. Mat Gamel out at 2nd.
Jonathan Lucroy singles on a ground ball to left fielder Justin Christian.
George Kottaras flies out to left fielder Justin Christian.
Defensive Substitution: Joe Panik replaces second baseman Emmanuel Burriss, batting 2nd, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Roger Kieschnick replaces right fielder Nate Schierholtz, batting 4th, playing right field.
Pitcher Change: Javier Lopez replaces Shane Loux.
Cesar Izturis grounds out, third baseman Conor Gillaspie to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Eric Farris pops out to first baseman Brandon Belt in foul territory.
Norichika Aoki grounds out, pitcher Javier Lopez to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Defensive Substitution: Andrew Susac replaces catcher Eli Whiteside, batting 7th, playing catcher.
Defensive Substitution: Ehire Adrianza replaces shortstop Brandon Crawford, batting 8th, playing shortstop.
Pitcher Change: Santiago Casilla replaces Javier Lopez.
Taylor Green walks.
Travis Ishikawa grounds into double play, second baseman Joe Panik to shortstop Ehire Adrianza to first baseman Brandon Belt. Taylor Green out at 2nd.
Caleb Gindl grounds out, second baseman Joe Panik to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Pitcher Change: Heath Hembree replaces Santiago Casilla.
Logan Schafer called out on strikes.
Martin Maldonado flies out to center fielder Gary Brown.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Brock Kjeldgaard replaces George Kottaras.
Brock Kjeldgaard strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Wilmin Rodriguez replaces Heath Hembree.
Cesar Izturis strikes out swinging.
Eric Farris singles on a ground ball to first baseman Brandon Belt.
Norichika Aoki flies out to center fielder Gary Brown.
With Taylor Green batting, Eric Farris picked off and caught stealing 2nd base, pitcher Wilmin Rodriguez to first baseman Brandon Belt to shortstop Ehire Adrianza to first baseman Brandon Belt.
